snippet.title: Bible Verse Challenge Gameplay Update!
snippet.description:
📢 Bible Verse Challenge - Exciting New Update! 🎉

Dear Bible Verse Challenge players,
We’re thrilled to announce a major update to improve your gameplay experience! Check out the latest changes that are now live in the game:

✨ 4 New Achievements Added!
Added scoring achievements for 25, 50, 500, and 5000!  The scoring update also removed the 10000 scoring achievement.

🕒 Removal of Elapsed Time
Time tracking has been removed from the challenge mode. Take your time to find the right answer, no more rush!

📊 Steam Leaderboard Integration
We’ve added Steam Leaderboards! Now you can track scores, compete with other players, and see the Top 10 leaderboard updated with profiles.

❤️ Revamped Heart & Scoring System
Lost a heart? No problem! You can now recover a heart after answering a question correctly.

✔️ Show Correct Answers
After each question, we’ll now show you the correct answer so you can learn as you go and continue whenever you're ready!

🎵 New Music Options
We’ve expanded the soundtrack! Now, you can choose from 5 different songs, or shuffle them for variety.

🔊 More Sound Effects
Enjoy a greater variety of sound effects for both correct and incorrect answers, giving the game a fresh feel!

📖 Two New Bible Versions
We’ve added the World English Bible (WEB) and Bible in Basic English (BBE)! To make it easier, the name of each version will be displayed for clarity.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3173120/Bible_Verse_Challenge/
